name: Ball (Mobile)
description:
You are a ball, Get to the end, But be careful, there is a chance, you may get corrupted...

Ball is about going through the levels to get to the end. There is no reason why you are because this game is still in development. Find the teleporter in each level to go to the next level, but be careful about the color of the teleporter. Green = Safe, Red = Corrupted. You get a fun win at the end

DOWNLOAD (PC) :

You will need two things to play this game:

Game Files: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PP0wcX9ZXB4kUpmL-0muxvnCUY-ZOBPw/view (If you do not get a [c3p] file go to bottom of page)

Construct 3 or later: https://editor.construct.net/

How to play:

1. Download File(s) and go to https://editor.construct.net/ 

2. Press [File] button and select game file

3. Press play button (Normally located at the top toward the left.)

Please leave a comment down below for any bugs or anything you want me to add.

Thanks for playing!
